name: @fhenixprotocol/cofhe-contracts
description: Smart Contract Library for the CoFHE with FHE primitives

scripts.postinstall: node -e "console.log('\x1b[31m%s\x1b[0m', 'Breaking changes detected in v0.1.0: encrypted type handles changed from uint256 to bytes32. You must regenerate ABIs and contract bindings. Migration guide: https://github.com/FhenixProtocol/cofhe-contracts/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md')"
